name: Countryballs - The Polandball Game
description:
▶No IAPs, no ads.◀

An Endless Countryball Runner (by BitStern)

Will MexicoBall pay for Donald Trump's wall for USAball?
Will UKball bregret Brexit?
Why does Germoney have to wörk?
Why did Europe run out of money?
Why can Poland not into space?

Countryballs is the endless arcade runner, you have been waiting for!

Features
• The very first Countryballs endless runner!
• Pay once and play! No in-app purchases!
• Play 16+2 different Countryballs!
• Explore many unique levels!
• 18 exclusive Polandball comics!
• Unlock new characters in the lottery!
• Share your high score & compete with friends!

BitStern - Independent Studios
